entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -2.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
